T02D2034:131b-1: rakta ya m'a ri yantra tattva ni rde sha ka bod skad du /
T02D2034:131b-2: gshin rje gshed dmar po'i 'khor lo'i de kho na nyid kyi gsal byed /
T02D2034:131b-3: bcom ldan 'das dpal gshin rje gshed la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2034:132a-1: med rnams la srung ba'i phyir /
T02D2034:132a-2: zhi ba la gi wang gis /
T02D2034:132a-3: ras dkar po 'am gro ga 'am smyug ma'i skogs pa'am /
T02D2034:132a-4: ras legs par bkrus pa la 'khor lo gnyis yang dag par bris te /
T02D2034:132a-5: der na ma'i nang du bcug pa'i ming gi yi ge bris la /
T02D2034:132a-6: nag nog la sogs pa spangs shing rdza phor kha
T02D2034:132a-7: dog gcig pa kha sbyar du mar dang sbrang gi
T02D2034:132a-8: nang du bcug ste skud pa dkar pos dkris nas
T02D2034:132a-9: bzhag ste / kha shar du bltas te thun gsum
T02D2034:132a-10: du gshin rje gshed sku mdog dkar po bsgoms nas
T02D2034:132a-11: bzhag ste / / me tog dkar pos mchod cing
T02D2034:132a-12: mdun du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi thog na bsgrub
T02D2034:132a-14: bum pa dkar po zla ba'i bdud rtsi'i chus yongs su gang bas dbang bskur bar bsam zhing /
T02D2034:132a-15: aom hr'i:shtri:wi krit'a na na h'um h'um phat phat na ma:che ge mo la sh'antim ku ru na ma:/
T02D2034:132a-17: skyes pa rnams kyi zhi ba'i las la gur gum gyis so //
T02D2034:132a-18: rgyas pa la'ang 'khor lo gnyis mngon par bris te /
T02D2034:132a-19: der yi ge sv'a h'a'i nang du ming yig bcug la mar dang sbrang gi nang du bcug la /
T02D2034:132a-20: rdza phor kha sbyar du skud pa ser pos legs
T02D2034:132a-21: par dkris te gzhag / de nas kha byang du
T02D2034:132a-22: bltas la gshin rje gshed sku mdog ser po'i skur
T02D2034:132a-23: yang dag par dmigs te thun gsum du me tog
T02D2034:132a-24: ser pos mchod cing zla ba ser po la gnas
T02D2034:132a-25: pa'i bsgrub bya kha dog ser po bsams la /
T02D2034:132a-26: bum pa ser po'i bdud rtsis chus dbang bskur zhing bzlas pa bya ste /
T02D2034:132a-27: aom hr'i:shtr'i:wi kri t'a na na h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
T02D2034:132a-30: aom hr'i:shtri:wi kri t'a na na h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
T02D2034:132a-31: boo shata che ge mo pushtim ku ru boo shata /
T02D2034:132a-33: gro ga 'am ras la rgya skyegs kyi khu ba'am tsandan dmar po 'am /
T02D2034:132a-34: ming med kyi khrag dang bsres pas 'khor lo gnyis bris te /
T02D2034:132a-35: ho:'i yi ge'i bar du ming bcug la /
T02D2034:132a-36: nag nog la sogs pa kha dog ngan pa spangs
T02D2034:132a-37: pa'i rdza phor kha sbyar du mar dang sbrang rtsis
T02D2034:132a-38: yang dag par bkang ste skud pa dmar pos ba
T02D2034:132a-40: de nas kha nub tu bltas la gshin rje gshed dmar po'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pas /
T02D2034:132a-41: thun gsum du me tog dmar pos mchod cing /
T02D2034:132b-0: zla ba dmar po la gnas po'i bsgrub @132b bya kha dog dmar po bsams te /
T02D2034:132b-1: rang gi lus las 'od 'phros pa'i 'od zer gyis
T02D2034:132b-2: rab tu bkang bas shin tu myos par gyur te
T02D2034:132b-3: / rkang pa gnyis kyi mdun du 'gyel bar bsam zhing sngags bzla bar bya'o //
T02D2034:132b-4: gal te dbang du ma gyur na mar dang sbrang
T02D2034:132b-5: rtsi spangs pa'i 'khor lo kho na seng ldeng gsol
T02D2034:132b-6: ba dud pa med pa'i me la gdung bar bya'o
T02D2034:132b-8: aom hr'i:shtri:wi kri t'a na na h'um h'um phat phat
T02D2034:132b-9: ho:che ge mo ma ma ba sham ku ru ho:
T02D2034:132b-10: aom hr'i:shtr'i:wi kri t'a na na h'um h'um phat phat
T02D2034:132b-11: boo shata che ge mo ba sha m'a na ya
T02D2034:132b-12: boo shata / dbang gi cho ga'o /
T02D2034:132b-14: // / dur khrod kyi ras sam r'a dza sa las
T02D2034:132b-15: byas pa'i ras la chos kyi khu bas 'khor lo
T02D2034:132b-17: yi ge dza 'am hri:'i bar du bcug pa'i ming gi yi ge bris te /
T02D2034:132b-18: rdza phor kha sbyar ram bud med kyi thod pa
T02D2034:132b-19: kha sbyar gyi bar du bzhag la gos dmar pos
T02D2034:132b-20: gtums te me tog dmar pos mchod cing /
T02D2034:132b-21: dgongs thun nyi ma lta bu'i gshin rje gshed dmar
T02D2034:132b-22: po'i sku zhags pa dang lcags kyu 'dzin pa bsams
T02D2034:132b-23: la / bsgrub bya'i snying gar lcags kyus phug cing ske nas zhags pas bcings la drangs par bsam /
T02D2034:132b-24: gal te 'ong bar ma gyur na de nas seng ldeng gi me la gdung bar bya'o //
T02D2034:132b-25: aom hr'i:shtr'i:wi kri t'a na na h'um h'um phat phat dza:de ba dattam a'a karsha ya dza:/
T02D2034:132b-26: rkang pa dgug pa'i cho ga'o /
T02D2034:132b-28: // / dur khrod kyi ras la ba bla'am yung ba'i khu bas 'khor lo gnyis mngon par bris te /
T02D2034:132b-29: yi ge lam gyi khongs su bcug pa'i bsgrub bya'i ming bris te /
T02D2034:132b-30: rdza phor ser po kha sbyar du bzhag nas //
T02D2034:132b-31: rdza phor la re kh'a gru bzhi bdun bris te /
T02D2034:132b-32: de'i steng du ri rab lcog chen po brgyad dang
T02D2034:132b-33: ldan pa yi ge h'um nang du bcug pa lcog
T02D2034:132b-34: gi steng du sa'i dkyil 'khor lam gyis mtshan pa
T02D2034:132b-35: / sna tshogs rdo rjes bskor ba skud pa ser pos bcings te /
T02D2034:132b-36: bdag nyid gshin rje gshed ser po bsams la bsgrub
T02D2034:132b-37: bya ser po kha lhor bltas nas sa'i dkyil 'khor
T02D2034:132b-39: gser gyi ri bdun dang ri bo mchog rab kyis mnan cing /
T02D2034:132b-40: sa'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng na sna tshogs rdo rje
T02D2034:132b-41: rgya gram gyis mnan par bsams te bzlas pa bya'o
T02D2034:132b-42: // aom hr'i:shtri:wi kri t'a na na h'um h'um phat
T02D2034:132b-43: phat lam de ba datta sv'a sth'a na stambha ya
T02D2034:133a-4: de bzhin du ming nang du bcug pa'i 'khor lo gnyis mngon par bris te /
T02D2034:133a-5: lam de ba datta s+ya ya th'a a'a ram bha
T02D2034:133a-6: k'a ra ya kri te ni wa ra ya ho
T02D2034:133a-7: bi r'u pa kam de ba datta yadznya datta s+ya
T02D2034:133a-8: w'aka stam bha ni ku ru lam /
T02D2034:133a-9: bzlas pa byas pas mnan par bya ste /
T02D2034:133a-12: // / lkugs par 'dod pas dur khrod kyi ras la 'khor lo gnyis mngon par bris te /
T02D2034:133a-13: bam de ba datta s+ya mu kham bandha ya bam /
T02D2034:133a-14: zhes pa nang du gzhug / gshin rje gshed kyi
T02D2034:133a-15: sbyor bas bsgrub bya lug gi snying du rab tu
T02D2034:133a-16: gzhug cing / sa'i dkyil 'khor bzhis za ma tog lta bur kha sbyar du byas te /
T02D2034:133a-17: rengs pa'i sbyor ba'i cho gas 'khor lo gnyis bri ba dang /
T02D2034:133a-18: sgom pa dang mnan par byas nas bzlas par bya'o //
T02D2034:133a-19: aom hr'i:shtri:wi kri t'a na na h'um h'um phat phat
T02D2034:133a-20: bam de ba datta s+ya mu kham bandha aa mu
T02D2034:133a-22: yul chos la sogs pa rmongs par 'gyur ro /
T02D2034:133a-24: // / dur khrod kyi ras la ske tshe dang tshva dang dri tsha ba'i mar khu dang /
T02D2034:133a-26: da du ra'i lo ma'i khu ba dang /
T02D2034:133a-27: ro bsregs pa'i sol ba dang /
T02D2034:133a-28: rang gi sdigs mdzub kyi khrag gis snag tsha byas
T02D2034:133a-29: la bya rog gi sgro rkang gi smyu gus 'khor
T02D2034:133a-30: lo gnyis mngon par bris te /
T02D2034:133a-31: yi ge h'um gi nang du bsgrub bya'i ming gzhug
T02D2034:133a-32: / kha lho phyogs su bltas pa gshin rje khro
T02D2034:133a-33: bo'i gzugs can / zhabs g-yon brkyang bas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs pa /
T02D2034:133a-34: bzhin mi sdug cing mche ba gtsigs pa /
T02D2034:133a-35: shin tu mi bzad cing zhal gyi ljags glog lta bur 'gyu ba /
T02D2034:133a-36: bskal pa'i me lta bu'i 'od zer can phyag mtshan mtshon cha sna tshogs 'phyar ba /
T02D2034:133a-38: lto ba che zhing dbu skra dang sma ra ser po gyen du 'bar ba /
T02D2034:133a-39: mgrin pa'i sbubs chu 'dzin gyi glog lta bu h'um
T02D2034:133a-40: gis yongs su gang bar bdag nyid rnam par bsams
T02D2034:133a-41: te / mdun du bsgrub bya gos dri ma can hrul po gyon cing /
T02D2034:133a-42: lus thams cad thal bas byugs shing me'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa /
T02D2034:133a-43: spyi bo dang mtshog ma dang /
T02D2034:133a-44: snying ga dang lag pa'i rtsa ba dang pus mo
T02D2034:133a-45: rnams kyi sngags kyi cho gas byas pa'i gos dang
T02D2034:133b-0: / srung ba rnams dang phral nas de'i lus la gnas pa'i lha rnams @133b drangs shing bsdus te /
T02D2034:133b-1: rang gi lus la rab tu bcug pas /
T02D2034:133b-2: de nas khang pa stong pa lta bur bltas la /
T02D2034:133b-3: khro bo'i tshul rnam pa sna tshogs /
T02D2034:133b-4: mtshon cha rnam pa sna tshogs phyag na 'phyar ba sprul te /
T02D2034:133b-5: bsnun cing dum bu brgya stong du byas nas /
T02D2034:133b-6: sha dang tshil bu dang rus pa rnams za zhing /
T02D2034:133b-7: khrag kyang 'thungs la bsregs shing thal ba byas nas /
T02D2034:133b-8: mdun du gshin rje char 'bebs pa'i sprin gyi mdog can lta bu ma he la gnas pa /
T02D2034:133b-9: dbyug to dang zhags pa 'dzin cing lto ba che ba /
T02D2034:133b-10: zhal gdangs shing mche ba gtsigs pa'i gzugs su rnam par bsams te /
T02D2034:133b-11: de'i snying gar gnas te des za bar bsams la /
T02D2034:133b-13: de nyid kho na'i cho gas 'khor lo gnyis mngon par bris te /
T02D2034:133b-14: yi ge h'um dang phat kyi nang du ming bcug
T02D2034:133b-15: pas de bzhin kho na'i bsam gtan la gnas pas
T02D2034:133b-16: / bsgrub bya lha dang bral zhing kha dreg can me'i dkyil 'khor la gnas shing /
T02D2034:133b-17: khro bo'i gzugs mi sdug pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis ral gri dang /
T02D2034:133b-18: mtshon shing dang dgra sta dang /
T02D2034:133b-23: lcags tho la sogs pa'i mtshon cha rdeg pa dang /
T02D2034:133b-24: dum bu brgya ru bcad par bsam zhing /
T02D2034:133b-29: mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa sna tshogs kyis za bar bsam zhing sngags bzlas par bya'o //
T02D2034:133b-30: aom hr'i:shtri:wi kri t'a na na h'um h'um phat phat de ba dattam m'a ra ya h'um phat /
T02D2034:133b-33: // / de bzhin du 'khor lo bsgrub bya'i ming phat kyi nang du bcug ba bris te ;
T02D2034:133b-34: thod pa kha sbyar du bzhag la skud pa sngon
T02D2034:133b-35: pos dkris te nyim phyed kyi dus su dur khrod
T02D2034:133b-36: du dod brus la bcug ste /
T02D2034:133b-37: gshin rje gshed kyi sbyor ba dang ldan pas bsgrub bya gnyis rta dang ma he la zhon cing /
T02D2034:133b-39: rdo rje khro bo'i tshogs dang bcas pas gnyis ka
T02D2034:133b-40: gnas par sprul te 'thab mo byed par bsam zhing
T02D2034:133b-41: sngags bzlas te / aom hr'i:shtri:wi kri t'a na na
T02D2034:133b-42: h'um h'um phat phat de ba dattam yadznya datta bi
T02D2034:133b-44: sdang ba rnam par dbye ba'i cho ga'o /
T02D2034:133b-46: // /'khor lo de nyid thod pa gnyis su yi ge
T02D2034:133b-47: h'um phat phat kyi khongs su bcug pa bris la
T02D2034:134a-0: thod pa kha sbyar byas nas @134a * //
T02D2034:134a-1: skud pa nag pos dkris te dur khrod du sbas
T02D2034:134a-2: la gshin rje gshed kyi sbyor ba dang ldan pa'i
T02D2034:134a-3: mdun du yam las rlung gi dkyil 'khor de'i thog
T02D2034:134a-4: tu rnga mo // de'i thog tu bsgrub bya'i rnam pa sngon po bsams te /
T02D2034:134a-5: rdo rje khro bo'i brab cing lho phyogs su 'gro bar bsams la skrod par 'gyur ro //
T02D2034:134a-6: aom hr'i:shtri:wi kri t'a na na h'um h'um phat phat de ba datta autstsha ta ya phat phat /
T02D2034:134a-9: // / khro bo gshin rje gshed mthar byed ni shin tu dmar ba /
T02D2034:134a-10: sbyor ba ni dur khrod kyi thal ba dang /
T02D2034:134a-14: chu tsha bas dur khrod kyi ras la 'khor lo
T02D2034:134a-15: gnyis gtor ma'i cho ga bstan zhing gsungs pa dang
T02D2034:134a-16: / zla ba zla ba'i tshes bcu bzhi la sha lnga dang /
T02D2034:134a-17: bdud rtsi lngas bzlas pa'i yul la bskus shing ldan par byas na /
T02D2034:134a-18: shin tu gdung bar byed pa'i mchog / khri phrag gcig gis 'byung po rnams //
T02D2034:134a-19: stong phrag gcig gis mkha' 'gro dang //
T02D2034:134a-20: yi dgas tshogs rnams gsod par byed //
T02D2034:134a-21: bzlas pa 'bum gyis rnal 'byor bdag / las rnams thams cad 'di yis byed //
T02D2034:134a-23: bye ba lnga yis smos ci dgos //
T02D2034:134a-24: slong mo za zhing mi bzlas te //
T02D2034:134a-25: ma bslangs pa yang chags mi bya //
T02D2034:134a-26: dam tshig rtag tu brtan bya zhing //
T02D2034:134a-28: rnal 'byor rig pa'i sems can kun //
T02D2034:134a-29: byams pa'i sems ni rtag tu bya //
T02D2034:134a-30: nyin re zhing dam zla re dang //
T02D2034:134a-31: lo re bzhin du rtag pa ru //
T02D2034:134a-32: dbyu gu drug cu rtsa bzhi gtong //
T02D2034:134a-33: gtor ma drug cu rtsa bzhi 'bul //
T02D2034:134a-34: bgegs rnams thams cad zhi ba dang //
T02D2034:134a-35: bsod nams yang ni 'phel ba'i phyir //
T02D2034:134a-37: gtor ma'i cho ga bstan par bya //
T02D2034:134a-38: dri chen dri chu bsres pa'i chus //
T02D2034:134a-39: mandala gru gsum byas nas ni //
T02D2034:134a-40: gshin rje gshed kyi rnal 'byor gnas //
T02D2034:134a-41: phyogs skyong rnams ni yang dag dgug / sngags ni 'di yis dgug par bya //
T02D2034:134a-43: aom aindr'a ya hr'i: ya m'a ya shtri:ba ru n'a ya bi /
T02D2034:134a-52: ba su dha ra ye phat /
T02D2034:134b-0: be ma tsi tra @134b ne sv'a /
T02D2034:134b-6: zhes pa 'dis rtag tu bza' ba ji snyed pa
T02D2034:134b-7: dang btung ba ji snyed pa thams cad kyi phud
T02D2034:134b-8: gshin rje gshed la dbul par bya'o //
T02D2034:134b-9: de rnams 'dis mnyes par bya zhing bzod par gsol nas ji ltar bde bar gshegs su gsol //
T02D2034:134b-10: bdag gis bsod nams ji snyed gang bsags 'di yis 'jig rten rnams //
T02D2034:134b-11: ma lus mya ngan rnams bcom de ni byang chub snod gyur te //
T02D2034:134b-12: bdag dang 'gro ba rnams kyang byang chub lam la nges sbyar nas //
T02D2034:134b-13: don dam bde bas legs ldan sangs rgyas sku ni thob par shog /
T02D2034:134b-14: ston ka'i zla ba lta bu yi //
T02D2034:134b-15: grub pa'i sgrub thabs nges pa ni //
T02D2034:134b-16: sems can rnams la phan phyir du //
T02D2034:134b-17: gnas brtan byang chub snying pos mdzad //
T02D2034:134b-18: dpal gshin rje gshed kyi las tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i
T02D2034:134b-19: de kho na nyid gsal bar byed pa zhes bya
T02D2034:134b-20: ba sgrub pa'i thabs rdzogs so /
T02D2034:134b-22: // / pandi ta rdo rje gdan pa ni ska lam ka'i zhal snga nas /
